name: GP Classic Racing
description:
Ah…the good old days. In the golden era of the 1960’s, racing was at its finest. The cars were classy and rules were scarce! Think you can take a ride to the past and prove you have what it takes to beat the best of the best? You’ll put your driving skills to the ultimate test in GP Classic Racing. Get behind the wheel of high-powered, rear wheel drive cars that handle very differently than the modern cars of today! Featuring ten challenging circuits, a variety of racing modes, and unlockable bonus material, you won’t want to come back to the present day!

• 10 challenging tracks with bonus circuits along the way
• Features powerful, rear wheel drive classic racecars
• Multiple race modes for additional challenge
• Unlock extras to help you race faster and beat the competition!
